WorkItem.Description:

Name 'User' is not declared, which also throws Name 'delblock' is not declared.
From what I understand these are both controlled by the User.Identity.IsAuthenticated command, but I can't seem to find the missing link to alleviate this problem.

Thanks in Advance...

Comments.Message: It's already encapsulated in a usercontrol. It's the LoginBanner control
